Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: .stdin_ready() at /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/prompt_toolkit/eventloop/asyncio_posix.py:65 handle: <Handle PosixAsyncioEventLoop.run_as_coroutine..stdin_ready() at /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/prompt_toolkit/eventloop/asyncio_posix.py:65> Expected Results: CLI should work normally. Action.author: sergey-shilov
Action.body: This CLI is deprecated, no longer supported and going to be removed, this ticket is not relevant any more and may be closed.
